accessories.name: CODE 1019 Position Pillow (48x40x12/12)
accessories.specification:
Intended for use following hip surgery when
post-operative positioning or immobilization is
required. Constructed of dense, fire retardant
foam that effectively provides maximum support.
Equipped with straps which help keep your lower
extremities in the correct position and allows for
quick, easy adjustments

accessories.name: CODE 1016 Sitting Pillow (44x10)
accessories.specification:
Produced with a cut out hole in the middle.
It is purposes of support in relieving pain from
hemorrhoids, hip, coccyx, strain, pain pre-and
post-surgery. It spreads the pressure from the body
weight over a larger area from coccyx to thigh
through its anatomic design.al.

accessories.name: CODE 1018 Sitting Pillow - Open Front (44x10)
accessories.specification:
Made of foam and featuring a specially-positioned
U-shaped cut-out that gently suspends your tailbone
to relieve pressure on your spinal cord. It is purposes
of support in relieving pain from hemorrhoids, hip,
coccyx, strain, pain pre-and post-surgery. It spreads
the pressure from body weight over a larger area
from coccyx to thigh through its anatomic design.

accessories.name: CODE 1014 Waist Support Pillow (35x34x12)
accessories.specification:
It is specially manufactured to help a proper sitting
position ensuring the spine remains aligned and relieve
back and lower back pains. It supports the lower back
waist and helps you sit up straight. It is designed that

office seats. Optionally it is manufactured from flexible foam.

accessories.name: CODE 1011 Visco Neck Support Pillow - Large (57x37x11/7)
accessories.specification:
The  Visco neck support pillow ensures
perfect comfort and relaxing for your
neck and shoulders, and can also
reduce pain, snoring, and sleeplessness
due to its special-shaped construction.

accessories.name: CODE 1116 Visco Anatomic Sitting Pillow (42x38x8/1)
accessories.specification:
The viscoelastic foam also called memory foam,

your weight in a homogeneous way so that
the pressure is considerably reduced. The
the anatomic shape of the pillow assures
better stability and a natural feeling of comfort.

accessories.name: CODE 1013 Reflux Pillow (65x60x24)
accessories.specification:
Reflux Pillow is designed to keep the torso
elevated to prevent stomach acid from
burning the esophageal lining during sleep.
Pillow keeps its firmness and is ergonomically designed.

accessories.name: CODE 1114 Visco Multi-Purpose Pillow (42x18x10)
accessories.specification:
This multi-use, highly adaptable pillow offers

Excellent to use as a Lumbar Pillow, Neck Support
Pillow, Wedge Pillow, and Knee Pillow. Supports,
allowing muscles to fully relax in a more restful position.

accessories.name: CODE 1011-J Visco Neck Support Gel Pillow (57x37x11/7)
accessories.specification:
The Visco neck support pillow ensures
perfect comfort and relaxing for your

pain, snoring, and sleeplessness due to

accessories.name: CODE 1013 Reflux Pillow (65x60x24)

accessories.specification:
Visco cushion comfort Designed for wheelchair users.

Conforms to the user's body providing

accessories.name: CODE 1112-J Visco Classic Gel Pillow (60x40x15)

ankle.name: CODE 1002 R.O.M Walker
ankle.specification:
ROM walker provides protected range-of-motion
following trauma or post-operative procedures.
ROM settings between 0°- 40° plantar-flexion
and 0°- 30° dorsiflexion. Wider foot-bed for
increased stability and to accommodate edema
or bandages. Swiveling rings allow parallel strapping.
Cushioned inner/outer sole absorbs shock
upon heel strike.

ankle.name: CODE 904 Lace-up Ankle Support
ankle.specification:
Ankle lace-up is a lightweight, extremely soft
and comfortable bandage. The thin and strong figure
8 straps, in combination with a circular elastic fixation
around the ankle, provide exceptional support.
 Spiral stays - Located on the sides of the brace,
the stays ensure the support fits snugly and retains
its shape, help you regain mobility, ease pain,
stimulate healing, and ensure that any swelling
subsides quickly.

ankle.name: CODE 904 Lace-up Ankle Support
ankle.specification:
Ankle lace-up is a lightweight, extremely soft
and comfortable bandage. The thin and strong figure
8 straps, in combination with a circular elastic fixation
around the ankle, provide exceptional support.
 Spiral stays - Located on the sides of the brace,
the stays ensure the support fits snugly and retains
its shape, help you regain mobility, ease pain,
stimulate healing, and ensure that any swelling
subsides quickly.

ankle.name: CODE 705 Woven Malleol Ankle Support
ankle.specification:
A supportive, warming and soothing support
for the painful ankle, made by breathable
Climate-comfort knitting system. Improve
circulation & keep joints warm. Soothe away
pain & stiffness. Ankle support with silicone
pads on the ankles for greater protection in
the area. It has to do with moderate or more
severe pain, for cases where ankle fracture
has been induced, acute pains and severe sprains.

ankle.name: CODE 706 Achilles Tendon Ankle Support
ankle.specification:
A supportive, warming and soothing support
for the painful ankle, made by breathable
Climate-comfort knitting system. Improve
circulation & keep joints warm. Soothe away
pain & stiffness. Knitted Achilles tendon support
with silicon pads. Protects Achilles tendons and
stabilizes the ankle, comfort material improves
proprioception. It has to do with moderate or
more severe pain, for cases where ankle fracture
has been induced, acute pains and severe sprains.

ankle.name: CODE 1003 Achilles Boot
ankle.specification:
It provides an optimal solution for both
the functional post-surgical treatment of
Achilles ruptures. Achilles boot provides
immobilization, protection, and comfort,
while the Achilles wedge kit provides
adjustable angles of plantar flexion that
can be easily modified through the
rehabilitation process. 3 levels to adjust
the height of the lift.

ankle.name: CODE 905 Dorsi-Flexion Bandage
ankle.specification:
Dorsi-Flexion Bandage is made of lightweight
neoprene material, ankle support engineered
to provide dynamic support for drop foot or
similar complaints. Dorsi-Flexion Bandage is
an easy-fit provides dorsiflexion of the foot
and visible improvement in the patient's gait
by providing support the moment the foot is
raised. Possible to wear in shoes.

ankle.name: CODE 1001-J Ankle Brace With Gel
ankle.specification:
Semi-rigid, anatomically designed shells for
protection, comfort and the prevention of
inversion/eversion.  Ankle brace with a gel pad
inside enhances circulation and reduces swelling.
May be heated or cooled for hot or cold therapy.
The foot icon assures the correct left/right orientation.
Hook and loop closures that adjust for the most
comfortable and easy fit.

ankle.name: CODE 1001-P Ankle Brace With Pad
ankle.specification:
Semi-rigid, anatomically designed shells for
protection, comfort and the prevention of
inversion/eversion.  Ankle brace with a pad
inside enhances circulation and reduce swelling.
The foot icon assures the correct left/right orientation.
Hook and loop closures that adjust for the most
comfortable and easy fit.

ankle.name: CODE 1300 Airtech Walker Short
ankle.specification:
A rigid plastic ankle orthosis that provides maximum immobilization of the ankle.
It has a removable sponge pad support laminated with soft towel fabric on the inner surface that comes in contact with the skin.
It features a practical air cushion and pump system that provides excellent stability and can be easily adjusted to fit the grip and foot.
The pump can be intermittently inflated to reduce swelling and pain by distributing pressure around the ankle.
It also has an adjustable belt support for extra protection and can be worn on either the right or left foot. It facilitates natural walking.

ankle.name: CODE 1001 Ankle Brace With Air (Air Cast)
ankle.specification:
Semi-rigid, anatomically designed shells for protection,
comfort and the prevention of inversion/eversion.
 Aircast system enhances circulation and reduces swelling.
Pre-inflated aircells for easy application. The foot icon
assures the correct left/right orientation. Hook and loop
closures that adjust for the most comfortable and easy fit.

ankle.name: CODE 1004 Foot Guard
ankle.specification:
AFO Footguard is designed to help position
the foot in the correct anatomical alignment.
It helps to correct excessive external and internal
rotation and over pronation and supination at
the ankle joint. It helps to provide control of foot
posture during rest. Immobilizing the ankle and
foot at rest may be useful in the case of sprains
and fracture rehabilitation by eliminating excessive
movement and stabilizing the ankle during rest.

ankle.name: CODE 911 Cast Shoe
ankle.specification:
Hallux Valgus post-surgical shoe protects
your cast or bandage with a special sole
that allows the patient to walk in a natural
way. Lightweight, easy to wear and remove

arm.name: CODE 205 Arm Sling (30°)

calf.name: CODE 801 Thigh Support
calf.specification:
It offers dynamic support and compression

The adjustable thigh and hamstring support

calf.name: CODE 802 Calf Support
calf.specification:
It provides adjustable support during

Heat therapeutic neoprene helps warm

element also stimulates blood flow which
can help prevent the build-up of lactic
acid during and post activity to reduce
the prospect of cramp  or stiffness whilst
also being a valuable recovery/rehabilitation
tool to injury

corsets.name: CODE 01 Woolen Corset
corsets.specification:

corsets.name: CODE 1030 Hyperextension Corset.
corsets.specification:
Hyperextension brace featuring 3 support
points: suprapubic, dorsolumbar and sternal
a structure of lightweight aluminum
a more aesthetic updated design; and
an innovative three-dimensional pectoral
support system. Its closure system is very
secure, fast and easy to use. All of the
upper padding is made from foam fabric,
thermoformed for greater comfort, and
can be easily removed. It's height and
the width can be arranged up to 4 stages.
It's designed perfectly to not sting the
suprapubic and sternal parts when sitting
or standing up.

corsets.name: CODE 1031 Hyperextension Corset Lux
corsets.specification:
Hyperextension brace featuring 3 support
points: suprapubic, dorsolumbar and sternal
a structure of lightweight aluminum; a more
aesthetic updated design; and an innovative

Its closure system is very secure, fast and
easy to use. All of the upper padding is made
from foam fabric, thermoformed for greater
comfort, and can be easily removed. It's
height and width can be arranged up to 4

the suprapubic and sternal parts when sitting
or standing up.

corsets.name: CODE 1032 Pectus Carinatum Orthosis
corsets.specification:
Pectus Carinatum orthosis is a lightweight support brace that applies pressure to the chest cage to keep the chest bone in a normal position and allows the chest cage to reshape permanently over time for a permanent result.
Its aluminum frame, which is placed around the chest, provides pressure from both the front and back to direct the chest bone into a neutral position.
The brace can be adjusted from the sides to fit each person for maximum comfort and effectiveness. The inside of the brace that touches the skin is made of EVA foam.

corsets.name: CODE 1035 T.L.S.O BRACE
corsets.specification:
The  TLSO ( Thoracic Lumbo Sacral Orthosis )
manufactured of spongy fabric with terry
cloth inside. The thermoplastic material
which provides rigid support in the abdominal
and dorsal parts of the corset. Support in the
sternum can be lengthened and shortened
as desired to fit a patient’s body. Also, it
restricts flexion of the body movements.
It has aluminum at the back and 2 other
hatchways so it closes twice. Keep abdominal
pressure in a stable for better tissue healing
after injuries around the whole back. Constrain
the movement from lower to the upper back for
spinal immobilization.

corsets.name: CODE 161 Posturex Bandage
corsets.specification:

corsets.name: CODE 240 Lumbomax Comfort
corsets.specification:

The soft, padded perineal straps prevent the corset from sliding upwards.

in extension

finger.name: CODE 33 Frog Splint
finger.specification:
This finger splints made of special aluminum
covered with plastazode inside. Frog splints
keep the distal interphalangeal joint in
extension while keeping the proximal
the interphalangeal joint in the anatomically
favorable flexion position.

finger.name: CODE 34 Baseball Splint
finger.specification:
This finger splints made of special aluminum

and protects the distal and proximal phalanges.

finger.name: CODE 35 Butonier Splint
finger.specification:
This finger splint made of thermoplastic
material and which keeps the finger in
extension according to the 3-point principle.

finger.name: CODE 36 Mallet Finger Splint
finger.specification:
Finger splint manufactured of special plastic

The fingers are mobile from PIP joint.
Protect the fingertip and nailbed.

finger.name: CODE 37 Proxi Splint
finger.specification:
This finger splints made of special aluminum

It provides finger immobilization in extension.
Hook and loop fastener is for easy adjustment.

foot.name: CODE 310-LUX Silicone Insoles Full Length
foot.specification:
The Insoles are ergonomically designed to
fit the anatomy of the wearer's foot, helping
with heel and arch pain. Constructed from a
Premium Grade Silicone for shock absorption
and cushioning. The insoles help reduce shock
loads, where blue zones help offer soft orthotic
cushioning. They also maintain the longitudinal
arch of the sole that helps with flat feet/fallen
arches. This can help reduce tension on both
the plantar fascia to help relieve associated
inflammation and pain.

foot.name: CODE 310 Silicone Insolewith Fabric
foot.specification:
Shock absorbing blue areas, air ventilation
system, anatomically shaped structure,
perfect silicone material. It distributes the
load on the arch of the foot evenly and
relieves the pressure on the joints.

foot.name: CODE 311 Silicone Heel Cupl Length
foot.specification:
The Heel Cushions are ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the
wearer's foot, helping with plantar
fasciitis and heel pain. Constructed
from a Premium Grade Silicone for
shock absorption and cushioning.
The heel cushions help reduce shock
loads in the heel area of the foot,
where the blue zone helps offer soft
orthotic cushioning. These inserts
can help reduce pressure and the plantar
fascia to help relieve associated inflammation
and pain. It can be used in most everyday
or sports shoes.

foot.name: CODE 312 Silicone Insole Covered with Fabric
foot.specification:
It is made of silicone material and the
the upper surface is covered with fabric.
Shock absorbing blue areas, air ventilation
system, anatomically shaped structure.
It distributes the load on the arch of the
foot evenly and relieves the pressure on the
joints. Being fabric-covered, it is easy to use.

foot.name: CODE 313 Silicone Medial and Lateral Wedge (Adhesive)
foot.specification:
It is made of silicone material and the upper
surface is covered with fabric. The Adhesive
Silicone Medial & Lateral Wedge is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's foot.
The Wedge can be used inside all kinds of footwear
thanks to the self-adhesive finish. This can be applied
to the medial or lateral part of the foot depending on
whether the foot is excessively inverting or everting.
It is designed to prevent rolling of the foot inwards or
outwards when walking and standing. By adjusting any
incorrect foot mechanics, the wedge can help with
medial and lateral pain.

foot.name: CODE 314 Silicone Metatarsal Arch Support (Adhesive)
foot.specification:
It is made of silicone material and the upper surface
is covered with fabric. It is placed within the proximal
of the metatarsal head (MTH). It relieves the pressure of
the metatarsal head (MTH) and reduces pain. Due to its
adhesive nature, it can be fixed within the shoe.
Reduces impact loads on the ankle, knee, hip and spine.

foot.name: CODE 315 Silicone Arch Support (Adhesive)
foot.specification:
It is made of silicone material and the upper
surface is covered with fabric. It supports the
longitudinal arch and reduces the increased
tension in the sole. It starts from the calcaneus
inner tubercle and continues until the rear of
the metatarsus heads. Due to its adhesive nature,
it can be fixed within the shoe.

foot.name: CODE 316 Heel Cup (Adhesive)
foot.specification:
It is made of silicone material and the upper
surface is covered with fabric. The area with
the calcaneal epin is softened.
This prevents the load from pressing onto
a single point. Due to its adhesive nature,
it can be fixed within the shoe.

foot.name: CODE 317 Epin Heel (Polyurethane)
foot.specification:
Heel pad help in correcting the alignment
while walking. The cushioned heels absorb
shock, give right elevation to the heel.

foot.name: CODE 321 Starflex Insole
foot.specification:
Arc support manufactured of special soft
thermoplastic material which has leather-covered
longitudinal and metatarsal support. Distributes
the standing body weight evenly and reduces
load and stress on the joints. Epin area relieves
the heel pain and heel spur.

foot.name: CODE 319 Cork Insole (With Epine)
foot.specification:
Arc support manufactured of special
thermoplastic material which has
leather-covered longitudinal and
metatarsal support. Distributes the
standing body weight evenly and
reduces load and stress on the joints.
The softened epin area relieves the
heel pain and heel spur.

foot.name: CODE 321-E Starflex Insole (With Epine)
foot.specification:
Arc support manufactured of special soft
thermoplastic material which has leather-covered
longitudinal and metatarsal support. Distributes the
standing body weight evenly and reduces load and
stress on the joints. The softened epin area
relieves the heel pain and heel spur.

foot.name: CODE 318 Cork Insole
foot.specification:
Arc support manufactured of special
thermoplastic material which has
leather-covered longitudinal and
metatarsal support. Distributes the
standing body weight evenly and
reduces load and stress on the joints.

foot.name: CODE 322 Steel Insole
foot.specification:
Anatomically shaped, made of unique
leather material and supported with
stainless steel. A soft cushion is placed
in the metatarsal area for more comfort.
Durable and long-life material. Supports
and maintain the normal longitudinal arch
and provides cushioning and support for
all metatarsal heads in a normal transverse
arch position.

foot.name: CODE 323 Silicone Toe Spreader
foot.specification:
The Silicone Toe Spreader is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's
foot. The toe spreader helps in the realignment
of the toes, particularly useful when bunions
cause the big toe to deviate inwards. This
device helps realign toes in the case of
separate close/overlapping toes, helping to
reduce pressure and friction. Easing pressure
between toes can also help with interdigital
corns and hard skin and calluses.

foot.name: CODE 326 Silicone Bunion Shield
foot.specification:
The Silicone Bunion Shield is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's
foot. The shield reduces pressure and friction
at the bone protuberance on the medial aspect
of the big toe. It works by cushioning and
protecting the toe, reducing friction between
the foot and footwear and acting as a shock
absorber.

foot.name: CODE 300 Silicone Toe Ring
foot.specification:
The Silicone Toe Ring is ergonomically designed
to fit the anatomy of the wearer's foot. The toe
ring helps with interdigital corns and inter digital
blisters caused by ill-fitting footwear. This device
helps reduce friction and soreness. Easing pressure
between toes can also help with inter digital
corns and reduce hard skin and calluses.

foot.name: CODE 324 Silicone Metatarsal Pad With Ring
foot.specification:
The Silicone Metatarsal Pad is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's
foot. The pad helps with pain and irritation
on the plantar surface of the metatarsals and
the ball of the foot. It is designed to help
prevent and relieve pain caused by ill-fitting
footwear. This is also useful in preventing
pressure sores, hard skin, and calluses in
this area. The insole may also help reduce
inflammation and soreness associated with
Morton's neuroma.

foot.name: CODE 325 Silicone Metatarsal Pad With Loop
foot.specification:
The Silicone Metatarsal Pad is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's
foot. The pad helps with pain and irritation
on the plantar surface of the metatarsals and
the ball of the foot. It is designed to help
prevent and relieve pain caused by ill-fitting
footwear. This is also useful in preventing
pressure sores, hard skin, and calluses in this area.
The insole may also help reduce inflammation
and soreness associated with Morton's neuroma.

foot.name: CODE 326 Silicone Bunion Shield
foot.specification:
The Silicone Bunion Shield is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's
foot. The shield reduces pressure and friction
at the bone protuberance on the medial aspect
of the big toe. It works by cushioning and
protecting the toe, reducing friction between
the foot and footwear and acting as a shock
absorber.

foot.name: CODE 327 Silicone Hammer Toe Cushion
foot.specification:
The Silicone Hammer Toe is ergonomically
designed to fit the anatomy of the wearer's
foot. It helps bring relief from the severity
of pain caused by hammer, claw or mallet
toes. By wearing over the affected toe and
under the ball of the foot, the toe crest
cushions and protects the area from further
friction and irritation. This helps relieve pain
and reduce swelling and inflammation both
over the toe joints and under the ball of the
foot, also useful in treating soreness
associated with Morton's neuroma.

foot.name: CODE 907 Elastic Hallux Valgus Splint
foot.specification:
This splint is a soft, comfortable daytime

It is used as a protective measure during knee injuries, surgeries, and rehabilitation periods and provides knee R.O.M control.

It use after liposuction operations applied to the lower abdomen, hips and the entire leg area.
On the front 3 agraphed systems can be adjusted according to the patient during the treatment process, and thus,
after the edematous areas that may occur after the surgery healed, the corset can be reduced thanks to these fasteners. It has lace trim. Genital area is open.
  By providing a controlled pressure and compression effect to the applied area.
It prevents excessive edema by applying equal pressure throughout the treatment period and helps your body shape to recover.

surgical-products.name: CODE 1883 HIP FAT TRANSFER FULL BODY COMPRESSİON CORSET
surgical-products.specification:
It is a full body compression corset used after fat infection and hip augmentation operations,
in which fat cells are removed by liposuction from the abdomen, hip and waist region where the fat tissue is dense.
Softer, gentler and flexible tulle fabric is used for minimum compression on the hips and back.
On the front 3 agraphed systems can be adjusted according to the patient during the treatment process and thus,
after the edematous areas that may occur after the surgery are healed, the corset can be reduced thanks to these fasteners.
It has adjustable shoulder straps and lace trim. Genital area is open.
By providing a controlled pressure and compression effect to the applied area, it prevents the edema and helps your body shape to recover.

beauty.name: Collagen Threads​
beauty.specification:
Collagen threads  with high potency hyaluronic acid. The collagen silk
threads are easy to use. The collagen silk threads are ideal for professionals,
perfect for professional use in cosmetic treatment. The collagen thread lifting
is approved for safe use in cosmetic studio. Special training is recommended.

beauty.name: Stemcell Serum
beauty.specification:
Helps to reduce wrinkling and fine lines on the skin surface due to its
collagen-containing formula.

physical-therapy-devices.name: Medisound 3000​
physical-therapy-devices.specification:
Ultrasound therapy is based on the ability of
ultrasound waves to penetrate into body
tissue. This type of stimulation produces a
thermal effect resulting from the
conversion of vibrational energy into heat.
Its results are widely used in the medical and rehabilitation fields.

physical-therapy-devices.name: Magnum 3000 Pro​
physical-therapy-devices.specification:
Powerful professional magnetotherapy with
many special programmes and features that make it effective to treat numerous
osteoarticular pathologies and for recovery after orthopaedic operations. It also provides the option of performing Total Body
treatments using the special Memory Foam mattress.

physical-therapy-devices.name: Genesy 600​
physical-therapy-devices.specification:
Genesy 600 is a device from the Globus
electrotherapy line designed for professional therapy, complete and easy to handle.
Its portability also makes it suitable for home therapy for the most demanding users.

physical-therapy-devices.name: alance​
physical-therapy-devices.specification:
Strengthening the muscle corset.
Prevention of spinal diseases.
Relieving muscle tension and back pain.
Stretching the spinal column.
Improving blood circulation and lymph flow.
Prevention of varicose veins, thrombosis and thrombophlebosis, chronic venous insufficiency and other diseases of the lower extremities.
Prevention and treatment of lymphostasis of the upper extremities.
Getting rid of cellulite, losing weight.
Comprehensive healing of the body.

slimming-devices.name: Lipo zero​
slimming-devices.specification:
Combination of Multi-polar RF, Vacuum & LED makes it
possible to deliver RF energy to the desired target area effectively
and precisely. Both face and body treatment is possible,
offering a wide range of benefits such as anti-wrinkle
and skin regeneration effect.

slimming-devices.name: Noble Shape​
slimming-devices.specification:
Noble Shape is a combinational device that outputs three technologies,
Low Level Laser, Amplitude Modulated Middle Frequency and
Radio Frequency at the same time while giving
a strong Body-Slimming effect.
